Love it!  Great for work or every day wear. Hayden has been washed several times no pilling.

For the first wear it fits great, but after you wash it, you will have wished you sized up. The length shortens and the arms tighten. it does have the adorable rouching at the shoulders and is made of nice material but it does shrink.

I love this top. It’s so cute on. Better quality than i expected too.

评论概述: Just like photos - good quality, super cute top (size Medium - white with blue stripes)
评论详情: This trendy striped top is exactly as shown in the photos.  The material is good quality and machine washable.  I washed the top using warm water, delicate cycle and laid flat to dry.  The sleeves are puffed but not too puffy and stood up as shown in photos.  I am 5'7", 135lbs and I bought a size Medium which was a perfect fit. The cut is flattering.  It was not tight or close fitting through the mid-section or across the chest. The fabric is fairly lightweight, similar to a light sweater material and would be comfortable in warm weather.  The blue stripes are more of a royal blue, leaning towards purple.
The material of this sweater is great. It’s soft and thick and warm. It’s fit and color are exactly as pictured. Highly recommend.
Thin material, that doesn't wash well

评论概述: True size… great and light material

I purchased this sweater shirt months ago w black stripes from HaOF brand. I thought this would be equivalent but it is not. This brand is paper thin. Not worth $20. Something you could buy from fast brands for cheap. Returning asap.
Nice material, breathable and comfortable. I accidentally washed it on hit and the orange bleed into the shirt. I'm definitely buying another.
I love this sweater. It’s so light and pretty. Puffy sleeves are perfect and cute. The fur is amazing. I’m 5’2” 130-135 lbs. It’s  cute with jeans, sweats, or shorts! Get it before it’s gone!
Love the style and fit of this sweater, but the first time I was wearing it I noticed some pulls in the fabric that are creating small holes so I probably won’t get to wear it again.

I bought this shirt as I was looking for more office wear that is comfortable and cute. This shirt is soft, well fitted, and stylish.  I received compliments on it.  I paired it with jeans, but it would look great with slacks as well.

评论概述: Great top that will get worn a lot.
评论详情: This is a very nice top. It is fitted but not obscenely tight. It looks more expensive than than it was. It would look nice with slacks for work or with jeans. I will reach for this again and again. It is thinner than I expected but I live in a very warm climate so that is good. It is not wrinkle resistant. I will need to steam the puff sleeves after every wash.

The sweater is adorable, colors are true to the picture as shown. The sweater is not see through. I have worn it to work and in a more casual fashion with jeans. It wears well in both instances. I am rating this 4 stars - when I opened the package, which almost looked vacuum packed, the sweater was wrinkled from folding so I steamed it. The material quickly “fuzzed” on the front 😔.
